effects.name: End Effect
effects.effect: At the end of each of their turns, the manticore can take 10 damage to end one effect on them that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.

effects.name: Solo Turns
effects.effect: The manticore can take two turns each round. They can't take turns consecutively.
Whenever the manticore deals damage to a creature, they don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature during that turn.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If the target is frightened, this ability gains an edge.

effects.tier2: 11 damage; M<3 4 poison damage, weakened (save ends)
effects.tier3: 14 damage; M<4 8 poison damage, weakened (save ends)

effects.effect: While weakened this way, a target takes 1d6 poison damage at the start of each of their turns.

items.name: Reflexive Instinct
items.trigger: A creature within distance deals damage to the manticore.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The manticore shifts up to 5 squares into the air, then can use Tail Spike against the target.

effects.tier1: Frightened (EoT); if the target has I<2 they are instead frightened (save ends)
effects.tier2: Frightened (EoT); if the target has I<3 they are instead frightened (save ends)
effects.tier3: Frightened (EoT); if the target has I<4 they are instead dazed (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The manticore shifts up to their speed, then can use Tail Spike against each enemy within distance of that ability.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The manticore sours their poison with enmity. Until the end of the encounter, the manticore has a double edge on power rolls against weakened creatures. Additionally, any creature weakened by the manticore's Tail Spike ability has their speed halved and takes an extra 3 poison damage at the start of each of their turns.
